transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, yes sir, Durgesh bol raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji bolo sir.
Executive: Kaise hai sir?
Customer: Are sir, aapne galat time phone kiya hai, thodi der baad karo aap. Ye mai kar deta hu aapko personal number. Abhi mai kahi ja raha hu.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Kyunki bhai, bhai ke bharose aapko pata nahi hai, meri koi customer se baat chal rahi thi iske liye.
Executive: Accha.
Executive: Nahi nahi, sir ek aapki incoming call aaya tha, toh abhi koi issues hai toh isko mai band kar dunga sir, agar koi issues hai toh.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ek ticket open ho chuka hai sir, aapka call aaya tha. Toh maine, maine aapse baat bhi kiya tha, toh koi issue agar koi problem hai toh mai toh aap mujhe bataiye, agar nahi hai toh mai isko close kar dunga sir.
Customer: Sir ji mai 1 baje phone karunga aapko, abhi mai driving, man lo driving nahi man lo, gaadi start kar diya, mai kahi ja raha hu.
Executive: Sir ha, catalogue ko dhyan rakhiye sir, next kis, aa rahi hai apni?
Customer: Kya sir?
Customer: Dijiye, ha, kis ka installment ka koi satuna nahi hai mere paas.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Sir aapki aawaz nahi aa rahi, kya bol rahe hai? Aa rahi hai sir.
Customer: Mai ye bol raha hu.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: Kis ko dekho kis ka wire ko, wire ka wire ka.
Executive: Kya wire ka sir? Aapki break ho rahi hai aawaz.
Customer: Mai ye bol raha hu, catalogue ka dhyan rakho. Bhai.
Executive: Sir catalogue pe hum work kar rahe hai.
Executive: Sir hum catalogue pe work kar rahe hai, aisa nahi hai, abhi just aapki live hui hai, toh aapka aa jayega, koi issue nahi hai aapki inquiries aayegi sir, Hanuman statue pe aapki inquiries course sab aapke increase honge, aisa nahi hai.
Executive: Jo bhi agar sir, jo aapka ticket hai usko mai close kar du, jo aapne call kiya tha aur maine usme response nahi kiya tha, toh maine aapka close kar du ticket?
Customer: Kar do kar do, usko band kar do.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Kya bol rahe hai aap jo aapke paas gayi hai usko band kar do, bol do.
Executive: Ha, close kar do na sir.
Customer: Ha kar do sir.
Executive: Ha aur okay, sir mai ye bol raha tha ki abhi jo leads aapne consume kiya hai, leads us din nahi aaya, uske baad kal kaisa response raha?
Customer: Kal ka accha response raha toh kal kaam hua sir, jaisi baat nahi hai.
Customer: Aur bolo, ha kal kaam hua tha na sir?
Executive: Ha ha, nahi nahi, hum yahi bol rahe hai ki jo leads dekhiye, jo abhi abhi aapka just abhi live hua hai preferred leader, okay? Toh usme thoda sa time dijiye aur abhi just aapko maine aapko sara listing dikha diya hai ki aur aapke top jo leader aapke top pe aapki listing aa chuki hai.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ha ji hello.
Executive: Ha bolo sir. Toh nahi nahi mai ye bol raha hu sir ki jo thoda sa time dijiye dekhiye kal aapke paas inquiries aayi hai, aisa nahi hai ki nahi aayi hai. Toh kabhi aap down hota hai toh uske liye aapko aap befikar rahiye, mai aapke catalogue pe work kar raha hu, thik hai? Aur aapko problem create nahi aane denge sir.
Customer: Sir mere ko problem kuch bhi nahi hai, mere ko agli store mein iska jo aapne phone karke dukhi kar doge please. Store mein itni jayegi, ye hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap humesha ji raat me call.
Customer: Raat ko?
Executive: Kya sir? Ha ha raat ko aapne call kiya tha sir.
Customer: Aapke sath sab lag gaye toh dasti se ye toh sab.
Executive: Nahi nahi jo mai aap meri baat hui thi jab mai ghar ja raha tha aur jo aapki aapki call aayi thi. Yaad hai na sir?
Customer: Baat ho gayi.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Ha ha baat.
Executive: Aur koi aur koi issues nahi hai sir?
Customer: Issue toh yahi hai sir ji. Maine toh bataya na aapko. Wahi issue hai.
Executive: Aap aapki break ho rahi hai sir aawaz.
Customer: Mai ye bol raha hu, koi issue nahi hai, yahi issue hai ki kis ka samay aa raha hai apna. Next installment ka toh koi mota business aayega. Toh aapko kis ke liye phone karne ki jarurat nahi padegi.
Executive: Kis ke liye dekhni padegi?
Customer: Apni.
Customer: Hamari installment aa rahi hai na meri?
Executive: Yes sir yes sir yes sir aa rahi hai.
Customer: Koi mota mere paas business aa jayega.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Toh aapko call nahi karni padegi installment ke liye. Ye cheez bol raha hu.
Executive: Ha ha mai yahi bol raha hu ki jo installment hai na sir, aapko already hum 30 ki jagah pe aapko 10 din aur extra mam ne diya hai, aapko bhi pata hai. Thik hai? Toh aap wo sari cheez sun raha hu, wo sari cheez sun raha hu. Man lo aaj bhai ka hai hamare paas me. Samajh rahe ho aap?
Customer: Nahi nahi, koi problem nahi aayega sir, leads me koi nahi problem aayega.
Customer: Bas ye hai.
Executive: Leads me aapka ha leads aate rahega, koi dikkat nahi hai, time pe usko payment kara dijiyega sir.
Customer: Mai aur kya bol raha bhai business milega toh mere paas payment kabhi toh aayega. Aap mere paas isliye request dali hai maine.
Executive: Sir dekho mai aapko jab hum deal kiye the, aapne khud bola ki hum 30 din ka hi dete hai, but aapne request kiya hai toh Reena mam ne already aapko 10 din ka aur aapko chance diya hai. Toh us date me aap kara dena, koi dikkat nahi hai aur service me aapko koi issue nahi hoga sir. As a account manager aapke aapke portal pe work karunga, kuch bhi issues hoga instant aapka hum problem solve karenge, thik hai? Uske liye aap tension mat lijiye. Ha, bas time to time apna payment karwa dijiyega aur aapki profile as it is chalte rahega, koi dikkat nahi hogi.
Customer: Uske liye maine aapse bola sir ji. Bhai thoda catalogue bhi vishesh special dhyan dena. Toh is payment agar time se aa jata hai toh aapko dobara call karne ki jarurat nahi padegi.
Executive: Okay. Okay sir. Samajh rahe ho aap meri baat ko?
Customer: Ha ha samajh raha hu sir, samajh raha hu.
Customer: Bhai business agar time se aa jayega toh installment ke liye aapko nahi.
Customer: Business aayega toh abhi kal nahi. Kal abhi chalo kal ek chota aaya hai. Man lo do 5000 mile hai benefit ke jyada toh nahi hai. Bhai ye mila hai, maine ye bol diya na aapko mai karunga.
Executive: Abhi just abhi live hua hai, thoda sa aapka teen saal ka hai sir.
Customer: Reason ye ho gaya na ki ek hafta apna Diwali me nikal gaya.
Executive: Ha bilkul sir bilkul.
Customer: Bhai ek hafta Diwali me nikal gaya.
Executive: Ha toh koi baat nahi sir, dekhiye ye toh long term ke liye hai na, aapka teen saal ka hai. Toh aap nishchint rahiye, service me koi dikkat nahi hai. Ha but time se apna payment isko karwa dijiyega sir, taki aapke profile ka humme hamper na ho, thik hai? Jo aapne liya hai, humne khud diya hai sir. Aisa nahi ki nahi aapne jo bola hai, humne kiya hai. But uska regard rakh ke on the time apna payment kara dijiyega sir.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Okay sir? Business aane de. Okay okay.
Executive: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer concerned about upcoming installment.

- Wants special attention to the catalog.



Resolution:

- Executive assured catalog work is in progress.

- Explained 10 extra days given for payment.

- Assured instant problem-solving for any issues.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- installment, catalogue, payment, leads
